title: ECB’s Rehn Tells Milano Finanza Inflation Is More Likely to Ease
description: Inflation risks in the euro area are slightly tilted to the downside in the medium term, European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn said in an interview with Milano Finanza.
content: Inflation risks in the euro area are slightly tilted to the downside in the medium term, European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn said in an interview with Milano Finanza.
